column4: My maximize, close and minimize buttons dosent show. I cant even see the bar where you can rightclick and (for example) choose option "Always on top"
Besides if I have 3 Firefox windows open and try to close just one, they all shuts down. And my cursor is an X all the time. It dosent kill anything though
You have the panel at the top of your screen?
yeah Ive got it but not on windows
btw, this happend while trying to solve the skype issue (which now for some reason I cant paste or type anything in the terminal)
something happend while trying to enable effects... it couldnt be enabled but I got my cursor back...
everything seems to be back to normal
Then have no worries - that was a Compiz crash
The more 'complicated' way to resolve that issue would have bee have you open up a terminal and run: metacity --replace
but what about the metacity --replace command?
okay... is that a compiz bug or something?
I believe you are right. Ive read alot about crashes that has to do with compiz
I guess machines crashes because human is not perfect ;)
